title: Summer Art Camp! 5 Days of Artists and Painting Monet Van Gogh,Matiss,& More
subtitle: Multi-Day Course
body: In this 5 day Class we will explore artists Monet , Matisse,Van Gogh,among others and then recreate paintings using crayon and watercolor.Students will have fun learning about the artists & creating their own art inspired by their work
author: Kimberly R Moseler
